languages.text: "Новый маршал будет лучше прежнего. Права на ошибку у нас нет".

traits.locale_text: "Новый маршал будет лучше прежнего. Права на ошибку у нас нет."

languages.text: "The new Marshal will be better than the old one. We have no margin for error."
languages.original_text: "Новый маршал будет лучше прежнего. Права на ошибку у нас нет".

traits.locale_text: "The new Marshal will be better than the old one. We have no margin for error."
"The new Marshal will be better than the old one. We have no margin for error."
"The new Marshal will be better than the old one. We have no margin for error."

"The new Marshal will be better than the old one. We have no margin for error."

languages.text: 「新しい将帥は前任者よりも優れているだろう。我々にミスの余地はない」
languages.original_text: "The new Marshal will be better than the old one. We have no margin for error."

traits.locale_text: 「新しい将帥は前任者よりも優れているだろう。我々にミスの余地はない」

languages.text: "Der neue Marschall wird besser sein als der alte. Wir haben keinen Spielraum für Fehler."
languages.original_text: "The new Marshal will be better than the old one. We have no margin for error."

traits.locale_text: "Der neue Marschall wird besser sein als der alte. Wir haben keinen Spielraum für Fehler."

languages.text: "Yeni Miralay eskisinden de iyi olacak. Hata yapma payımız yok."
languages.original_text: "The new Marshal will be better than the old one. We have no margin for error."

traits.locale_text: "Yeni Miralay eskisinden de iyi olacak. Hata yapma payımız yok."

languages.text: «El nuevo Mariscal será mejor que el anterior. No tenemos margen de error».
languages.original_text: "The new Marshal will be better than the old one. We have no margin for error."

traits.locale_text: «El nuevo Mariscal será mejor que el anterior. No tenemos margen de error».

languages.text: “新任元帅肯定会比之前的元帅更加出色，我们已经没有犯错的余地了。”
languages.original_text: "The new Marshal will be better than the old one. We have no margin for error."

traits.locale_text: “新任元帅肯定会比之前的元帅更加出色，我们已经没有犯错的余地了。”

languages.text: « Le nouveau maréchal sera mieux que l'ancien. Nous n'avons aucune marge d'erreur. »
languages.original_text: "The new Marshal will be better than the old one. We have no margin for error."

traits.locale_text: « Le nouveau maréchal sera mieux que l'ancien. Nous n'avons aucune marge d'erreur. »
